edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack.Card

    • Uses of Card in edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack

      Methods in edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack that return Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card Blackjack.dealerHit()
      makes the dealer hit and returns a reference to the card he drew so it can be displayed
      Card Deck.draw()
      removes the top card and returns a reference to it
      Card Blackjack.getDealerCard()
      returns a reference to the Card that the dealer is showing
      Card Hand.getFirstCard()
      gets the first card in the hand
      Card Hand.getSecondCard()
      gets the second card in the hand
      Card Blackjack.playerHit(Player player)
      makes the player passed as a parameter hit and returns a reference to the card drawn so it can be displayed
      Methods in edu.ucsb.cs56.S13.Blackjack with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Hand.addCard(Card c)
      adds a Card to the ArrayList of Cards and keeps track of whether or not it was an ace
      void Player.drawCard(Card c)
      draws a Card for the player and checks if the total exceeds 21
      javax.swing.ImageIcon BlackjackGui.getMyImage(Card c)
      returns the image corresponding to the Card passed in
